list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: used to identify a specific person or thing observed by the speaker.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Đó là vợ của anh ấy đằng kia

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: referring to a specific thing previously mentioned, known, or understood.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: đó là một ý kiến hay

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: used in singling out someone or something and ascribing a distinctive feature to them.
used instead of “which,” “who,” “whom,” or “when” to introduce a defining or restrictive clause, especially one essential to identification.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: the woman that owns the place
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Người phụ nữ sở hữu nơi này

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: used to identify a specific person or thing observed or heard by the speaker.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: nhìn người đàn ông đó ở đó

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: referring to a specific thing previously mentioned, known, or understood.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: he lived in Mysore at that time
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Anh ấy sống ở Mysore vào thời điểm đó

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: used in singling out someone or something and ascribing a distinctive feature to them.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: I have always envied those people who make their own bread
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Tôi luôn ghen tị với những người tự tạo bánh mì

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: referring to a specific person or thing assumed as understood or familiar to the person being addressed.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: where is that son of yours?
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Con trai của bạn ở đâu?

list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: I would not go that far
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Tôi sẽ không đi xa đến thế

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: introducing a subordinate clause expressing a statement or hypothesis.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: she said that she was satisfied
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Cô ấy nói rằng cô ấy hài lòng

list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: oh that he could be restored to health
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Ồ rằng anh ta có thể được khôi phục sức khỏe
